column4: im thinking about buying a new laptop with duo core cpu and sata150 hdd, will ubuntu be ok with them?
Yes. I have a SATA disk and a core duo and it works fine
Just one word of advice: If you go with 6.06 (and not 6.06.1) make sure you update the kernel (there were some fixes - it was very disappointing without those updates )
It was something related to the CPU - it has been fixed though :)
